SELECT ac.PROTECT_COMMENT_NO, ac.PROTECT_COMMENT, ac.PROTECT_COMMENT_REGIDATE, ac.PROTECT_COMMENT_WRITER, CASE WHEN MOD(ac.PROTECT_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 1 THEN m.MEMBER_NAME WHEN MOD(ac.PROTECT_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 2 THEN cm.CENTER_MEMBER_NAME END AS COMMENT_WRITER_NAME FROM TBL_PROTECT_COMMENT ac LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON MOD(ac.PROTECT_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 1 AND ac.PROTECT_COMMENT_WRITER = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CENTER_MEMBER cm ON MOD(ac.PROTECT_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 2 AND ac.PROTECT_COMMENT_WRITER = cm.CENTER_MEMBER_NO WHERE ac.PROTECT_NO = #{adoptNo}
